original_text:
And when he had taken counsel with the people, he appointed those who were to sing to the Lord and praise him in holy attire, as they went before the army, and say,
“Give thanks to the Lord,
    for his steadfast love endures forever.”
korean_text: 백성과 더불어 의논하고 노래하는 자들을 택하여 거룩한 예복을 입히고 군대 앞에서 행진하며 여호와를 찬송하여 이르기를 여호와께 감사하세 그의 인자하심이 영원하도다 하게 하였더니

sentences.original_text: And when he had taken counsel with the people,
he appointed those who were to sing to the Lord
and praise him in holy attire,
sentences.korean_translation: 거룩한 옷을 입고 그를 찬양하게 하며,

sentences.original_text: as they went before the army,
for his steadfast love endures forever.”
